NK015(ba)013:0: gtang rag gi mchod bstod sogs ni /
NK015(ba)013:1: mchod pa rnams gso bran bgyis te /
NK015(ba)013:3: stong pa'i ngang las mchod snod dbyings kyi zhing khams bsam gyis mi khyab par /
NK015(ba)013:4: mchod rdzas ye shes lnga yi rnam rol 'dod yon
NK015(ba)013:5: gyi rnam pa ma lus pa so so'i lha mo'i
NK015(ba)013:6: tshogs dang bcas pa nam mkha' gang bar gyur /
NK015(ba)013:10: +aahmh'u sarba pany+tsa a mri ta h'u h+r+aihtha /
NK015(ba)013:11: ma h+aa rak+ta dz+wa la man+dala h'u h'u h'u phata /
NK015(ba)013:12: +aahmh'u ma h+aa ba ling+ta te dz+wa ba ling+ta b+ha
NK015(ba)013:13: la b+ha te gu h+ya sa ma ye s+w+aa h+aa
NK015(ba)013:15: na mahsarba ta th+aa ga ta b+h+yo badz+ra push+pe grih+na h'u /
NK015(ba)013:22: ma h+aa sarba pany+tsa a mri ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK015(ba)013:23: ma h+aa rak+ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK015(ba)013:24: ma h+aa ba ling+ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK015(ba)013:26: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /
NK015(ba)013:27: ye shes rgya mtsho rab zab thugs //
NK015(ba)013:29: nor bu rin chen yon tan mdzod //
NK015(ba)013:30: rdo rje'i yid la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)013:32: yig brgya lan gsum gyis nongs pa bshags /
NK015(ba)013:33: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
NK015(ba)013:34: ji srid nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can
NK015(ba)013:35: thams cad mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
NK015(ba)013:36: sa la ma bzhag gi bar du rgyal ba rnams
NK015(ba)013:37: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar brtan par bzhugs su
NK015(ba)013:38: gsol / bye brag tu bskyed cing spyan drangs pa'i
NK015(ba)013:39: lha tshogs rnams rten 'di nyid la brtan par bzhugs
NK015(ba)013:40: gsol / su gsol // bzhugs nas kyang byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol /
NK015(ba)013:41: su pra tish+tha badz+ra ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)013:44: rdul tshon dang tshom bu la /
NK015(ba)013:45: khyed kyis sems can sogs kyis gshegs gsol dang /
NK015(ba)013:47: 'dir ni gzugs dang sogs kyis brtan bzhugs bya'o //
